extendedInfo.description: Calculate tips and split your bills easily!1) Type the bill amount,2) decide how large tip to give,3) and set the number of people to split between.Round the amount to pay or the tip amount if you like.Tipping before tax is also possible.All the calculations are immediately visible on the screen.To sum up, with this intuitive application you can:- split the bill between any number of people- calculate the tip on the bill after or before tax (configurable in Settings)- type the bill amount in a handy calculator- see the changes in calculations right awayKeywords:bill, check, tip, split, split the bill, tip calculator, tip calc, bill splitter, check splitter

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Easy to use and very helpful.
reviews.author: A Google User
